LanguageData.AvaliEgg.label: Avali egg
LanguageData.AvaliEgg.description: An avali egg. If all goes well, it hatch into Avali kit.\nAvali eggs are valued among many people from glitterworld moneybags to backstreet culinarians. Those eggs are not only very tasty (expecially if prepared) but also have a wide range of anti-aging and healing properties. Avali, however, fundamentally disagree with this point.
